description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/orangutan
test phase = participants were presented three conditions of two trials each
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
within-participant experimental manipulation - baseline/  backward blocking / retrospective discounting
type of instruction presented to the participant - demo_alone
ID number of the functional object
side on which the functional object was presented - left / right
refers to first choice of the participant - left / right
whether the participant chose object a or b (a refers the object that was placed on the detector by itself in the retrospective discounting and backward blocking conditions)
whether participant chose the object that was associated with the effect every time it was placed on top of the detector - yes (1) /  no (0)
